EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_5 Steps for Push Based Apps_Q315.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: 5 Steps to Developing Push-based Apps in the Age of Connected Devices
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for our upcoming 5 Steps to Developing Push-based Apps in the Age of Connected Devices on Thursday, July 23, 2015. Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, July 23, 2015 Time: 10:00AM PDT/5:00PM GMT
Join the Session <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1017712/3AB63181FBAF0B1AF4AFE9393DAB928A> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}} We look forward to you joining us! The Pivotal Team
